snippet.title: 2014 NBA playoff schedule: Pacers, Raptors, Bulls try to bounce back in Game 2
snippet.description:
2014 NBA playoff schedule: Pacers, Raptors, Bulls try to bounce back in Game 2 by Jason Patt on Apr 22 2014, 11:00a
Three higher-seeded Eastern Conference teams will try to even up their respective series on Tuesday.

snippet.title: NBA playoff scores, results and highlights from Sunday's Game 1 contests
snippet.description:
NBA playoff scores, results and highlights from Sunday's Game 1 contests by SB Nation NBA Staff on Apr 21 2014, 8:35a
The two top contenders for the title held off challenges from pesky lower seeds, while the two No. 4 vs. No. 5 matchups produced fireworks at night, with the lower seed winning both times.

snippet.title: Chelsea's strikers have predictably let them down
snippet.description:
Chelsea's strikers have predictably let them down by Kevin McCauley on Apr 19 2014, 3:35p
Jose Mourinho might be the best manager in the Premier League, but not even he can get Chelsea's group of strikers firing consistently all season.

snippet.title: NBA betting odds: Miami Heat favored in Eastern Conference
snippet.description:
NBA betting odds: Miami Heat favored in Eastern Conference by OddsShark on Apr 18 2014, 12:14p
Indiana is the top seed but Miami gets the nod as top betting choice in odds to win the NBA Eastern Conference title.

snippet.title: 2014 NBA playoff predictions: Odds favor a Heat vs. Spurs Finals rematch
snippet.description:
2014 NBA playoff predictions: Odds favor a Heat vs. Spurs Finals rematch by Tom Ziller on Apr 17 2014, 2:00p
A basic prediction system warns us of impending doom to all who face the Spurs.

snippet.title: How Kevin Durant took the MVP from LeBron James
snippet.description:
How Kevin Durant took the MVP from LeBron James by Tom Ziller on Apr 14 2014, 10:33a
Necessity pushed Durant further down the path to greatness. Now, he has caught up to LeBron.

snippet.title: NHL Scores: Fresh faces shine, veterans say goodbye on final day of regular season
snippet.description:
NHL Scores: Fresh faces shine, veterans say goodbye on final day of regular season by Pat Iversen on Apr 14 2014, 8:00a
There were new beginnings and endings on the last day of the season.

snippet.title: NASCAR Darlington 2014: Bojangle's Southern 500 preview
snippet.description:
NASCAR Darlington 2014: Bojangle's Southern 500 preview by Jordan Bianchi on Apr 12 2014, 5:44p
The date may be different but Darlington is still Darlington and a Southern 500 victory is something to covet.

snippet.title: 2014 NCAA Tournament: A beautifully insane college hoops season crowns its ideal champion
snippet.description:
2014 NCAA Tournament: A beautifully insane college hoops season crowns its ideal champion by Mike Rutherford on Apr 8 2014, 3:00p
For five months, we were all wrong about everything. So why did anyone expect the season's last three days to be anything different?

snippet.title: 2014 NFL mock draft: Ryan Shazier to Green Bay Packers at No. 21
snippet.description:
2014 NFL mock draft: Ryan Shazier to Green Bay Packers at No. 21 by Brian Galliford on Apr 11 2014, 12:00p
Aside from a fully healthy Aaron Rodgers, what do the Packers need to re-establish themselves as Super Bowl contenders in a loaded NFC?
